mapper.select: select * from (select A.stcd as stcd, (select ADDVNM from ST_STBPRP_B B, ST_ADDVCD_D D where B.ADDVCD = D.ADDVCD and A.STCD = B.STCD) as cnnm, (select STNM from ST_STBPRP_B where STCD = A.STCD) as stnm, sum(nvl(drp, 0)) as maxRain from (select * from ST_STBPRP_B where ADDVCD > 360000 and ADDVCD <= 369900) A left join ST_PPTN_R B on A.stcd = B.stcd where tm > to_date(#{tm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') and tm <= (sysdate + 1 / 24) group by A.stcd order by maxrain desc) where maxrain > #{maxrain} and rownum < 100

select distinct (addvcd),(select ADDVNM from ST_ADDVCD_D where ADDVCD = D.ADDVCD) as cnnm, sum(C.drp) / count(C.stcd) avgRain, max(C.drp) as maxRain from (select A.stcd, sum(nvl(drp, 0)) drp from (select * from ST_STBPRP_B where ADDVCD > 360000 and ADDVCD <= 369900) A left join ST_PPTN_R B on A.stcd = B.stcd and tm > to_date(#{tm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') and tm <=(sysdate + 1/24) group by A.stcd) C left join ST_STBPRP_B D on C.stcd = D.stcd group by addvcd order by maxRain desc
